## VirtualScroller.getIndex() method

Get item index by pixel offset;

**Signature:**

```typescript
getIndex(offset: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | number | pixel offset |

**Returns:**

number

item index;

## Remarks

Time complexity: `O(log2(itemCount))`
